analysis¶

analysis.getdominantcolors(img)¶
Returns the dominant colors in a flag image. Specifically, all colors that make up more than

1% of all pixels. Not suitable for flags with gradients yet.

Parameters

img (PIL.Image) – A Pillow Image object containing the flag to be analysed.

Returns

A list of dicts. Each dict contains the colour’s rgb values under the key ‘rgb’ as a triple, and the number of times that colour appears under the key ‘count’ (e.g [{‘count’: 246410, ‘rgb’: (255, 255, 255)}, {‘count’: 350526, ‘rgb’: (0, 94, 184)}] )

Return type

[{string: int, string:(int, int, int)}]

flaggart
